name: MedievalDice
description:
Tactical game, where dice decides which actions you can take.

Whole game is played by left clicking, chose ability at the bottom, the game will automatically chose the lowest cost die.

As per usual, time really ran out on me, so there are no sounds, game balance is what it is, game could use plenty more features and of course there are plenty of bugs, but I think the concept could work.

Overall nice project, might revisit the idea at some point.
